Fabiana is 31 years old, widowed, and lives with her four children in her own home. She has worked in agriculture and livestock her whole life. When she started a family, she was responsible for maintaining the home, and this encouraged her to work more with livestock. Her cows produce milk that she sells daily, and she also sells animals like cows, bulls, sheep, and pigs. Prior to selling them she fattens them up to be able to earn more money and make up for the money she invests.

Her children help a lot with the work, but when it comes to cultivating the land, she has to hire laborers to help. She feels that her works lets her be with her children and always have food. Her biggest desire is to increase the quantity of animals she has. This is her first loan with MFP and she is very happy to know she has financial support and is thankful for all the people who gave her the opportunity to develop her business. She will use the loan money for planting hay to feed her animals and also to plant beans and potatoes.

loans.use: To hire laborers to help plant hay, beans, and potato

loans.name: Anielka Elizabeth

texts.es: Anielka Elizabeth tiene 22 años, su actividad es una pulpería. Hace más de 2 años que tiene este negocio. Tiene un hijo a su cargo pues es madre soltera Anielka ha logrado aprender mucho con este negocio, que está ubicado en la vivienda de su Mama  ya que es aquí donde obtiene más clientes pues ella ofrece granos básicos, golosinas, pan, detergentes y productos necesarios para el hogar. Es una joven trabajadora y luchadora que todos los días sueña con salir adelante. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de una gran variedad de productos que le solicitan, debido a que se acerca buena época quiere ofrecer de todo un poco.
texts.en: Anielka Elizabeth is 22 years old.  She owns a small grocery store.  She has had this business for more than 2 years.  She has a child in her care since she is a single mother.  Anielka has managed to learn a lot through her business which is located in her mom's house since that is where she gets most customers.  She offers her customers basic grains, candies, bread, detergents and household products.  She is a hard-working and determined young woman who dreams every day of getting ahead.  She would like to use her loan to buy a large variety of products which her customers are requesting, owing to the fact that a good period is approaching and she wants to be able to offer a bit of everything.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Hayde

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “SACSAYHUAMAN ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Hayde; La socia tiene 48 años de edad, la socia es soltera y tiene  3 hijos ella se dedica a la venta de comida en el mercado de San Blas desde hace 1 año, La socia trabaja desde las 8 de la mañana, alistando todas sus verduras, platos, local y todo para atender a sus clientes desde muy temprano, la socia desea implementar su puesto de comidas y para ello solicita el préstamo para poder comprar utensilios de cocina, insumos entre otros. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para la cocina y de utensilios básicos para su atención.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Hayde is a member of the “Sacsayhuaman” community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province, in Cusco department.

Hayde is 48 years old.  She is single and has 3 children.  She has been selling food in San Blas market for one year.  She works from 8 o'clock in the morning getting her vegetables, dishes, premises and everything else ready so that she can serve her customers from very early in the morning.  She would like to continue with her food stall and for that reason she is requesting a loan to buy cooking utensils and supplies.  She is requesting a loan to buy cooking supplies and basic utensils.

She is grateful for the loan and appreciates it.  She pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy cooking supplies and basic utensils

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
Juan de 27 años, es pescador y vende pescados en el puerto donde todos los pescadores venden. Vive en un cantón llamado Playas uno de los lugares turísticos del Ecuador con una diversa dimensión de mariscos.  

Cuando él era joven el papa le enseño como pescar y obtener su propia comida el aprovecho lo que el papa le enseño y lo convirtió en su negocio. Compro redes y un motor para una canoa y comenzó a pescar en un mayor volumen para vender pescados en un puesto cerca de su casa. En la actualidad sale en la madrugada a pescar y regresa en la mañana para vender la libra de pescado a $ 2.50, la liba de camarón a $ 4.00. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar redes, alises para su canoa y así tener más facilidad al pescar. En el futuro quiere tener una embarcación completa y tener una familia.
texts.en:
Juan, 27, is a fisherman and sells fish in the port where all the fishermen sell.  He lives in a canton called Playas, one of Ecuador’s tourist destinations knows for its vast array of seafood.

When he was young his father taught him how to fish for his own food.  He took advantage of what his father taught him and turned it into a business.  He bought nets and a motor for his canoe and started fishing larger quantities to sell fish in a stand near his home.  Currently, he goes out at dawn to fish and returns in the morning to sell fish at $2.50 a pound and shrimp at $4.00 a pound.

He will use the loan to buy nets and propellers for his canoe to fish more easily.  In the future he’d like to have a complete boat and to have a family.

loans.use: For nets and propellers.

loans.name: Gricelda

texts.es: Griselda tiene 29 años, vive con su esposo y sus 4 hijos en su casa propia. Desde su niñez se ha dedicado a la ganadería y la agricultura, es así que en la actualidad lo viene haciendo con ayuda de sus hijos menores, ya que su esposo trabaja en otra ciudad. Desde entonces se esfuerza cada día en cuidar a sus animales, alimentándolos. Por otro lado, también se dedica a cuidar la siembra de papa, habas, oca entre otros productos; que después de varios meses lo comercializa en el mercado mayorista de su ciudad. Afirma que le agrada su trabajo, pues le permite estar con sus hijos, además que puede disponer de alimento y aunque  muchas veces es muy sacrificado realizar estas tareas, tiene el deseo firme de continuar adelante con estas actividades. Es su primer crédito que tiene con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, asimismo agradece a todas las personas que le ayudaron a desarrollar su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de ovejas y cerdos.
texts.en: Griselda is 29 years old.  She, her husband, and their 4 children live in their own home.  Since she was a girl, she has worked with dairy cattle and in agriculture.  Today she does the same work with the help of her young children.  Her husband now works in another city.  Since then, she struggles each day to care for her animals and to feed them.  On the other hand, she also sows pototoes, broad beans, oca (an edible root), and other vegetables; after several months, she sells them in the wholesale market of the city.  She enjoys her work since it permits her to be with her children and to take care of their meals.  Although she often makes sacrifices to do her work, she definitely wishes to continue with her current work.  This is her first loan from MFP (local lending institution).  She is very glad to have this financial support and is grateful to everyone who helps her develop her business.  With the loan proceeds, she will purchase sheep and pigs.

loans.use: Purchase sheep and pigs.

loans.name: Ma. Luisa

texts.es: La Sra. N. es una mujer muy activa y responsable, deseando simpre tener un entorno agradable y sobre todo el mejoramiento de su casa, a base de esfuerzo y trabajo a logrado ir construyendo su casa, ella es empleada domestica y sus hijos ya estan casado a pesar que siempre la procurar y estan al pendiente de ella, a ella no le gusta depender de ellos es una mujer muy independiente, el credito lo quiere porque esta haciendo una division en su casa para hacer lo que es sala y  comedor.
texts.en: La Señora N. is a very active, responsible woman.  She always wants pleasant surroundings and above all wants to make improvements to her house.  For this reason, she struggles and works to finish the contruction of her house.  She is a domestic worker.  Her children are already married, although they always watch out for her and are very devoted to her.  She doesn't like to depend on them and is a very independent woman.  She requests this loan because she is dividing one room in her house into a dining room and living room.

loans.use: Home improvement

loans.name: Dacia

texts.en:
Dacia A.’s parents inherited her grandfather’s cattle ranch in Sonora, Mexico, in 1975. A short decade later, after her father attended a “Holistic Resource Management” workshop in Albuquerque, New Mexico, her parents were inspired to “actively participate in the creation of a sustainable, ranching culture.”  Her father is a certified Holistic Resource Management Instructor and he holds workshops for sustainable ranching methods to ranchers in the Sonora Desert area. Aside from the cattle ranch, her parents also make mesquite lump charcoal. They prune the mesquite trees to help them grow and they use the pruned mesquite branches in four ways: they lay the brush on the ground to catch the sparse and precious water, they manufacture beautiful wood tiles, cutting boards, and wood flooring, they grind mesquite beans to make a healthy powder meal called Pechita, and lastly, they burn the mesquite in an underground pit to create mesquite lump charcoal.

Dacia’s parents have been manufacturing the mesquite lump charcoal for years and distributing the product to different buyers in Mexico. They discovered that buyers in Mexico were selling their charcoal for a much higher price to people in the U.S. This was the incentive for Dacia to start her own business in the U.S. to sell directly to U.S. consumers. With Dacia being a recent graduate from the University of Texas in El Paso this past May with a degree in Marketing and Management, she is now ready to market and sell the product in the U.S. This past summer, she created her own business with a separate name than her parents’, Lumbre. 

Dacia will use this loan for operating expenses and buying more mesquite charcoal from her parents. Dacia says that if she had not received a loan, she “would have been stalled. ACCION Texas-Louisiana really helped my business move forward.” Since graduation, Dacia has been dedicating her time to marketing the product to restaurants and stores in El Paso. She is also trying to find big buyers in Colorado and California who would be interested in the green and sustainable processes her family uses to create this product.  

Dacia says that the process of applying for a loan really helped her because it gave her time to realize what her actual costs were and where she should allocate her loan. 

A challenge for Dacia is that people claim that the process of making charcoal is harmful because it emits smoke, which contaminates the air. Dacia argues that people buy charcoal regardless and that their ranch utilizes the pruned branches of mesquite in a sustainable way. 

Eventually, Dacia would like to see Lumbre’s mesquite lump charcoal in the grocery store right next to Kingsford charcoal. 

Feel free to check out Dacia’s website at http://www.lumbreverde.com

loans.use: To purchase her first load of Mesquite Charcoal

loans.name: Vidal

texts.es: Vidal tiene 47 años, vive con su esposa y sus 7 hijos en su casa que es propia. Hace más de 20 años que se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales, así como también en la siembra de papa, habas y cereales. Esta actividad la desarrolla en compañía de su esposa e hijos, quienes en sus ratos libres, están dispuestos a llevar a pastear a los animales o de llevarles el alimento en el establo. Luego de varios meses, cuando los toros están gordos, ofrece un precio muy alto por su venta, asimismo sucede con los otros animales, como: ovejas y cerdos. Durante todos estos años, estas actividades agrícolas y ganaderas le han permitido sostener a su familia y por tal su deseo es incrementar la cantidad de animales que tiene. Es su primer crédito que tiene con MFP, esta muy contento de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero. Además agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono para la siguiente siembra de papas y habas.
texts.en:
Vidal is 47 years old.  He lives with his wife and 7 children in his own home.  He has been raising and selling animals for 20 years.  He also grows potatoes, beans and cereals.  He carries out this business activity together with his wife and children who, in their free time, are prepared to take the animals out to graze or take their food out into their stable.  Then, after several months, when the bulls are fattened, he offers them for sale for a very high price.  He also does this with the other animals such as sheep and pigs.

Over all these years, these farming and livestock activities have enabled him to support his family.  For this reason, he would like to increase the quantity of animals which he has.

This is Vidal's first loan from MFP.  He is very happy to know that he has financial support.  He is also grateful to all those people who will fund his loan since it will be very useful for him in making progress in his business.  He will invest his loan in buying sacks of fertilizer to use when he sows his next crop of potatoes and beans.

loans.use: To buy sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Jose Efrain

texts.es: El Sr. Jose Efrain, Es una persona que vive  al lado de su esposa e hijo pequeño, el trabajo durante 5 años en una empresa  de refrescos, pero le toco la liquidacion hace un poco menos de un año, y como su esposa queria trabajar, el le habia comprado un puesto para hamburgesas el cual trabajaban solo los fines de semana, pero debido a que la gente les ha estado pidiendo mas variedad, ellos quieren agrandar el negocio poniendo tacos en el dia y extender la venta todos los dias de la semana, estan muy entusiasmados en agrandar el negocio, ya que han tenido muy buena respuesta a la venta de hamburgesas. y sobre todo porque lo estan haciendo en familia y asi ellos se ayudan mutuamente, y  pueden hacer mas capital.
texts.en:
Jose Efrain lives together with his wife and young child. For five years he worked in a soft drinks company, but the company was liquidated a little under a year ago. 

Since his wife wanted to work, he purchased a hamburger stand where they used to work only on the weekends. Because customers have been asking for greater variety, they want to expand the business to offer tacos during the day and to extend their sales days to every day of the week. 

They are very enthusiastic about expanding the business, since they have already had a great response to their hamburger sales. Above all they are doing it as a family, and in this way they mutually help each other and can increase their capital.

loans.use: To stock up on merchandise for the stand and to expand the variety of food.

loans.name: Bertha Alicia

texts.es:
Bertha de 26 años, tiene una tienda de víveres en la parte delantera de su casa, vive en una zona periurbana ubicada a las afuera de Guayaquil llamada Duran y caracterizada por su ecología de disolución. 

Como no tenía oportunidades de trabajar ella comenzó a vender lotería y frutas en la calle para poder ayudar con los gastos familiares. Con algunos ahorros y ayuda de su esposo que es taxista compro víveres y ubico un pequeño local de tablas en la parte delantera de su casa para la tienda. Comenzó a tener rentabilidad y se quedo con el negocio vendiendo verduras, frutas, arroz, enlatados etc. Ha venido trabajando desde las 06h00am hasta las 22h00pm. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar bebidas, arroz, verduras y frutas para surtir mas su tienda. En el futuro quiere tener su propia casa ya que ahora la alquila.
texts.en:
Bertha is 26 years old.  She has a grocery store in the front of her home.  She lives in a peri-urban area on the outskirts of Guayaquil called Duran which is noted for its deteriorating ecosystem.

As she didn't have any opportunities for work, Bertha started selling lottery tickets and fruit in the street so that she could help with her family's expenses.  With some savings and the help of her husband, who is a taxi driver, she managed to buy some groceries and set up a small premises in the front of her house for her store.  Her business began to be profitable and she stuck with it, selling vegetables, fruit, rice, canned goods, etc.  She works from 6.00am to 10.00pm.

Bertha will use her loan to buy drinks, rice, fruits and vegetables to better stock her store.  In the future, she would like to have her own home since her current house is rented.

loans.use: To buy rice, vegetables and drinks

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es: Eduardo, de 27 años, es un joven muy alegre y trabajador, vive en casa de sus padres y lo que más desea es forjarse un buen futuro, aunque para eso tenga que trabajar muy duro. En la ciudad de San Francisco las cabinas de Internet más visitadas son las de Eduardo, su carismática forma de atender, junto a los juegos en red que ofrece y sus precios más bajos que los de la competencia, han hecho que tenga mucho clientes, los cuales han hecho crecer su negocio y mejorar sus ingresos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es atender a sus clientes y lo hace con mucha paciencia y amabilidad, lleva 2 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer en sus cabinas todo el día, abriendo desde muy temprano, hasta muy altas horas de la noche. Con el tiempo, desea mejorar las instalaciones de sus cabinas de Internet, para poderle brindar a sus clientes un mejor servicio. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, sabe que este aporte será muy beneficioso en el desarrollo de su actividad. En su banco comunal es un socio muy responsable, motivo por el cual es muy respetado. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, planea comprar una computadora nueva, para incrementar el número de servicio de Internet.
texts.en:
Eduardo, 27, is a cheerful, hard working young man.  He lives in his parents’ house and what he most wants is to forge a good future for himself even if that means having to work very hard.

Eduardo’s Internet access booths are the most popular ones in the city of San Francisco.  His charismatic customer service and the games he has available on line as well as having prices lower than his competitors have resulted in his having many customers who have made his business grow and improve his income.

What he likes best about his work is customer service, something he does with much patience and kindness.  He has been in business for two years and considers the most difficult part of the job having to stay at his booths all day opening very early and staying open until late at night. In time he’d like to improve his Internet access booths in order to offer better service to his customers.

This is his second loan with MFP.  He knows that this will be a significant factor in his business’ development.

He is a very responsible member of his communal bank which makes him be quite highly respected.  He will use the 2000 new sol loan to buy a new computer to increase the number of Internet access units.

loans.use: To buy a computer.

loans.name: Felicita Mariana

texts.es:
Felicita de 29 años, tiene un comedor. Vive con su esposo e hijos en una zona periurbana ubicada a las afuera de Guayaquil llamada Duran y caracterizada por su ecología de disolución. 

Por el sector donde vive hay muchas personas que trabajan en empresas y no había tenían un lugar donde comer. Uno de los empleados de una empresa le pidió a Felicita que cocinara para algunos empleados y fue ahí que todos los días les cocinaba  hasta que tuvo una clientela mayor y comenzó a sacar mesas y sillas afuera de su casa. Ella trabaja con ayuda de dos personas desde las mañana que sale a comprar los víveres para la comida hasta que prepara los almuerzos y los vende a $ 1.60. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar mesas, sillas y utensilios para el comedor. En el futuro quiere tener un local donde tenga espacia para su cocina ya que ahora cocina en la cocina de su casa.
texts.en:
Felicita is 29 years old and operates a small restaurant from home. She lives with her husband and children in Duran, on the outskirts of Guayaquil, an area characterized by its deteriorating ecosystem.

There are many factories and businesses where she lives, and until she started her business, there were no places for those businesses' employees to eat. Her activity started when a worker from one of the nearby factories asked her if she would be willing to cook lunch for a few of them. Soon more and more people started expressing interest in eating at her place, so she began putting more tables and chairs around the house to accommodate them. She counts with the help of two people to run the restaurant. Shopping for groceries, preparing the lunches, etc keep them all very busy. She sells each lunch plate for $1.60.

She will be using her loan to buy more tables, chairs and utensils. She hopes to be able to move her restaurant to a place with a bigger kitchen, in the future.

loans.use: To buy more tables, chairs and utensils for her restaurant

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es: Graciela, de 40 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Jorge de 40 años y sus 2 queridos hijos Marion de 14 y Jorge de 7 años, quienes son el principal motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. En la ciudad de San Francisco Graciela tiene su tienda de abarrotes, ella se siente muy feliz con su negocio, ya que le es muy rentable y está muy bien ubicada, justo en la calle principal de la ciudad. Desde las 5 y 30 de la mañana abre su tienda y se dispone a vender los productos que tiene en stock, esta actividad la realiza hasta las 10 de la noche que es la hora cuando cierra su tienda. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es vender y es muy buena haciéndolo, ya que siempre sus clientes salen muy contentos de su tienda, lleva 4 años en este negocio y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día dentro de su bodega, sin poder salir a la calle a realizar otras actividades. En adelante, espera mejorar su tienda y hacerla crecer, para así poder atender mejor a sus clientes. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, espera ser puntual en sus pagos, ya que no desea perjudicar a las demás socias de su banco comunal, en donde es muy querida y respetada. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más productos para implementar mejor su tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Graciela is 40 years old.  She is a very kind and hard-working woman.  She lives in her own home together with her husband, 40 year-old Jorge, and her two beloved children, Marion who is 14 and Jorge who is 7.  Her children are the main motivation behind her hard work.

Graciela has a grocery store in the town of San Francisco.  She is very happy with her business since it is very profitable and very well located, in the main street in town.  She opens her store at 5.30am and starts to get ready to sell the products which she has in stock.  She does this until 10.00pm which is when she closes her store.  What she most likes about her work is selling and she is very good at doing this since her customers always leave her store very happy.  She has been in this business for 4 years and considers the most difficult bit of her work to be the fact that she has to stay in her store all day long without being able to go out and do other things.  In the future, she is hoping to improve her store and make it grow so that she can better serve her customers.

This is Graciela's fifth loan with MFP.  She hopes to be punctual with her repayments since she doesn't want to inconvenience the other members of her community bank who all like her and respect her.  She will use the 1,000 nuevos soles she is requesting to buy more products so that she can improve her grocery store.

loans.use: To buy products to stock her store

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MANOS JUNTAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Isabel; ella tiene 31 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de servicio de taxi, su esposo hace taxi en las diferentes calles del Cusco y ella se dedica a ama de casa y juntos sacan adelante a sus hijos, la socia quisiera tener una tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Isabel, 31, is a member of the “MANOS JUNTAS” (Hands Together) communal bank located in Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is married and has three children.  She alternates her daily chores with taxi services.  Her husband provides taxi services along various streets in Cusco and she’s a housewife.  Together they raise their children.  She would like to have a grocery store and is asking for funds for vehicle maintenance and repair.

She thanks all those who will share in her dream and pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: For vehicle maintenance and repair.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MANOS JUNTAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Norma; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de perfumería y regalos, ella tiene un puesto en el centro comercial confraternidad que trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia quiere tener otro puesto de venta de regalos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como regalos y perfumes.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Norma, 38, is a member of the “MANOS JUNTAS” (Hands Together) communal bank located in Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is married and has three children.  She alternates her daily chores with the sale of gift items and perfumery.  She has a stand in the Confraternidad Commercial Center and works from 8am until 6pm.  She’d like to have an additional sales stand to sell gift items.  She is asking for funds to buy merchandise like gift items and perfumes.

She thanks all those who will share in her dream and pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy merchandise like give items and perfumes.

loans.name: Kathy

texts.es: Kathy, de 28 años, es una joven muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en una casa alquilada junto a su querido hijo Aldair de 8 años, quien es su principal motivación para todos sus esfuerzos. La tienda de Kathy es la primera en abrirse en la ciudad de San Francisco, desde las 6 de la mañana sus puertas ya están listas para recibir a sus madrugadores compradores, quienes sabiendo de la variedad de la mercadería que tiene en su tienda no dudan en comprarle, ya que tienen la seguridad de que van a encontrar las cosas que necesitan. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y enterarse de las cosas que suceden en su barrio, lleva 3 años en este negocio y considera que lo más difícil es permanecer todo el día dentro de su tienda sin poder salir. Con el tiempo, anhela hacer crecer su negocio y brindarle a sus clientes un mejor servicio. Este es el primer crédito con MFP y espera poder pagarlo a tiempo, ya que no quiere causarle problemas a las socias de su banco comunal, en donde es muy respetada debido al orden que le pone al grupo. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más productos para implementar mejor su tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Kathy is 28 years old.  She is a very humble and hard-working young woman.  She lives in a rented house together with her son Aldair who is 8 years old and the main motivation behind all her hard work.  Kathy's store is the first to open in the town of San Francisco.  Her doors are already open at 6 in the morning to receive her early-rising customers who, knowing what a great variety of merchandise she has in her store, don't hesitate to buy from her since they are sure that they are going to find what they need.

What Kathy most likes about her work is chatting with her customers and finding out what's been happening in the neighborhood.  She has been in this business for 3 years and she considers the most difficult thing about her work the fact that she has to stay in her store all day long without being able to go out.  Over time she hopes to grow her business and provide her customers with a better service.

This is Kathy's first loan from MFP and she hopes to be able to pay it back on time since she doesn't want to cause any inconvenience for the other members of her community bank where she is very respected because of the order which she brings to the group.  She will use the 1,000 nuevos soles she is requesting to buy more products to better stock her grocery store.

loans.use: To buy more products to stock her store

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es: Lucila, de 56 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y alegre, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Samuel de 52 años y su querido hijo menor Bryan de 15 años, a quienes desea brindar una menor calidad de vida. El negocio de Lucila esta ubicado en la ciudad de San Francisco, su ferretería es una de las más conocidas de la ciudad debido a la gran variedad de productos que tiene en venta, ella se esfuerza mucho por tener su negocio bien surtido, es por eso que cada fin de mes viaja a la ciudad de Lima a comprar los materiales que se acabaron. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es ayudar a sus clientes a elegir los mejores productos para sus construcciones, lleva 25 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que cargar los pesados materiales que trae desde la capital, pero aún así ella sigue firme en sus metas. Con el tiempo desea, ampliar las instalaciones de su ferretería, para poderle brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Este es el décimo quinto crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas puntualmente y esta dispuesta a hacerlo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy alegre y siempre está poniendo la cuota de humor en el grupo. Con los seiscientos nuevos soles solicitados, viajará a la ciudad de Lima a comprar más materiales de construcción para su ferretería.
texts.en:
Lucila, 56, is an unassuming, cheerful woman.  She lives in her own house with her husband Samuel, 52, and her beloved youngest son Bryan, 15, for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life.

Lucila’s business is located in the city of San Francisco.  Her hardware store is one of the best known in the city because of the vast variety of products she has for sale.  She works hard to have a well-stocked store and that’s why she goes to the city of Lima at the end of every month to stock up on items she has run out of.

What she most enjoys about her work is helping customers select the best tool for their projects.  She has been in this business for 25 years and considers the most difficult part having to carry the heavy items she brings all the way from the capital.  Despite this, however, she reaches her goals firmly.  In time, she’d like to expand her facilities to provide better customer service.

This is her 5th loan with MFP.  She is aware that she must repay on time and is willing to do so.  She is a cheerful member of her communal bank who always contributes her bit of good humor to the group.

She will use the requested 600 new soles to travel to Lima to buy building materials and supplies to stock her hardware store.

loans.use: To buy stock items for her hardware store.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “SACSAYHUAMAN ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Antonia; La socia tiene 46 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene  4 hijos ella se dedica a la venta de artesanía, la socia trabaja desde hace 15 años la socia realiza diversos trabajos, ella borda y también elabora muñecas de trapos y con trajes típicos, todo hecho en telas, vende bisutería y adornos varios. La socia desea comprar mercadería para implementar su negocio y de este modo aumentar su mercadería y sus ganancias ella comprará materiales para elaborar las muñecas de trapo y para comprar llaveros y algunos huacos retratos.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank “Sacsayhuman" which is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province and department of Cusco.

The member's name is Sra. Antonia; she is 46 years old, married, and has four children.  She makes a living selling crafts and has done this for fifteen years. She make different kinds of things like embroidery and rag dolls dressed in typical clothing -- all made out of fabric.  She also sells costume jewelry and various types of ornaments. She would like to buy merchandise to implement her business and in this way increase both her merchandise and her profits.  She will buy materials to make rag dolls and to buy key chains and some Huaco (type of pottery) frames.

She acknowledges and appreciates the loan through this medium also agrees to make her payments in the agreed upon time frame.

loans.use: To increase her merchandise.

loans.name: Hayme Iris

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MANOS JUNTAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Hayme Iris; ella tiene 33 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de palos, de leña y palos de madera, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m y junto a su esposo trabajan en este negocio de venta de palos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de palos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar palos de madera y leña al por mayor.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the communal bank "Manos Juntas" ["Hands Together"]. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, and belongs to the province and department of Cusco.

The partner is Mrs. Hayme Iris. She is 33 years old, has a common-law marriage, and has two children. She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling sticks and firewood. She works from 8:00am until 7:00pm. She works with her husband in this business of selling wood. The partner wants to grow and improve her wood selling business. She asks for the loan to buy wholesale sticks and firewood. 

The partner thanks those who form part of this dream by means of this resource. She promises to follow through with the payment of her dues in the established location.

loans.use: To buy sticks and firewood at wholesale

loans.name: Eligna

texts.es:
Eligna de 49 años, tiene un puesto de venta de encebollados (plato típico que se comen en el desayuno). Vive en una zona periurbana ubicada a las afuera de Guayaquil llamada Duran y caracterizada por su ecología de disolución. 

Desde joven ella trabajo haciendo comidas para poder ayudar con los gastos de su familia. Comenzó readecuando un pequeño local en la parte delantera de su casa vendiendo encebollado (plato elaborado con pescado, cebollas, yucas). En la actualidad continúa con su negocio levantándose a las 06h00 para iniciar con la preparación de los platos hasta que termina y comienza a venderlos.  

Para seguir con las ventas de su plato ella quiere comprar yucas y pescado para hacer más platos. En el futuro quiere tener un local grande y tener mayor rentabilidad en su negocio.
texts.en:
Eligna is 49 years old.  She sells 'encebollados' (a traditional dish which is eaten for breakfast).  She lives in a peri-urban area on the outskirts of Guayaquil called Duran which is noted for its deteriorating ecosystem.

Since she was a young girl, Eligna has been making food in order to help with her family's expenses.  She started by adapting a small premises in the front part of her home to sell 'encebollado' (a dish made from fish, onions and cassava).  She is currently continuing with her business, getting up at 6.00am to start preparing her dishes until she is finished, then selling them.

To continue in her business she would like to buy cassava and fish so that she can make more dishes.  In the future, she would like to have a bigger premises and for her business to be more profitable.

loans.use: To buy fish and cassava

loans.name: Mirna

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MANOS JUNTAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Mirna; ella tiene 39 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de locutorio donde se realizan llamadas telefónicas a diferentes partes del mundo, la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m y por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para pagar las recargas de teléfono.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
She belongs to the communal bank "Hands Together," which is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province and department of Cusco.

The member is Ms. Mirna; she is 39 years old, single, and has 1 son.  She works at her business, a call center where telephone calls are made to different parts of the world  from 9 :00 am to 6:00 pm. This is how she helps get her children ahead.  The member wants to improve her business and is requesting a loan to pay for the phone recharge.

The member thanks all those who are part of this dream, by this means, and agrees to comply with the payment of her dues on time.

loans.use: This member requests a loan to buy phone recharges.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 49 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Eloy de 49 años y sus 2 hijos menores William de 19 y Janeth de 13 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. En la ciudad de San Francisco, si uno desea comprar unos zapatos o sandalias muy bonitos y a la moda, tiene que visitar la tienda de María, sus novedosos modelos traídos por ella misma desde la ciudad de Lima, marcan una gran diferencia con la mercadería de la competencia, lo cual ha hecho que su negocio sea muy concurrido por los clientes. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es aconsejar a sus clientes sobre los zapatos o sandalias que mejor les quedan, lleva 7 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día dentro de su tienda en espera de clientes. Con el tiempo, desea poner otro negocio, esta vez incursionaría en la comida, ya que ha visto que es una buena fuente de ingresos. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas y espera serlo ahora también. En su banco comunal es una persona muy querida por el resto de sus compañeras. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más zapatos y sandalias de la ciudad de Lima, para mejorar el stock de su tienda.
texts.en:
María is 49 years old.  She is a very happy and hard-working woman.  She lives in her own home with her husband, 49 year-old Eloy, and her two dependent children, William who is 19 and Janeth who is 13, who she would like to provide with a better quality of life.  In the town of San Francisco, if you want to buy some very nice, fashionable shoes or sandals, you have to visit María's store.  She brings her new styles from the city of Lima herself.  They are very different from the merchandise provided by the competition which has made her business very popular with her customers.

What María most likes about her work is advising her customers on which shoes or sandals suit them best.  She has been in this business for 7 years and she considers the most difficult aspect of her work to be having to stay in her store all day waiting for customers.  Over time, she would like to set up another business.  She would like to break into the food business as she has seen that it is a good source of income.

This is María's fifth loan with MFP.  She has been very punctual with her repayments and she hopes to continue to be.  In her community bank she is very well liked by the rest of the members.  She would like to use her loan for 2,000 nuevos soles to buy more shoes and sandals in the city of Lima to improve her store's stock.

loans.use: To buy more shoes and sandals to stock her business

loans.name: Evelin

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “SACSAYHUAMAN ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Evelin; La socia tiene 28 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene  1 hijo ella se dedica a la venta de artesanía, específicamente a la elaboración de muñecas típicas, la socia realiza en tela de color piel los rostros y manos y les hace el atuendo respectivo y también les hace con hilo negro los parpados, ojos y cejas y la boca de color rojo, la socia desea un préstamo para poder comprar materiales para la elaboración de muñecas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para la elaboración de muñecas de trapo.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the communal bank "SACSAYHUAMAN". The communal bank is located in the Huanchac district, and belongs to the province and department of Cusco.

The partner is Mrs. Evelin. She is 28 years old, married, and has one son. She sells crafts, specifically making traditional dolls. She makes faces and hands with skin colored fabric. She makes their outfits in the same way. Also, she makes the eyelids, eyes, and eyebrows with black thread, and the mouth with red thread. The partner wants a loan to be able to buy materials for making the rag dolls.

The partner is thankful for and values the awarded loan through this means. And in the same way promises to follow through with the payment of her dues in the established location.

loans.use: To buy materials to make rag dolls.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MANOS JUNTAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Angelica; ella tiene 52 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. mistura (es un material hecho a base D. papel que se utiliza en fiestas) y luego los distribuye a las diferentes tiendas que venden la mistura, al socia quiere ampliar el negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como papeles D. colores.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the communal bank "MANOS JUNTAS" ["Hands Together"]. The bank is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

The partner is Mrs. Angelica. She is 52 years old and is married with two children. She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling "mistura" (a material maD. mostly of paper that is used at parties), and then she distributes it to the different stores that sell the "mistura". She wants to grow her business. She asks for this loan to buy materials such as colored paper.

The partner is thankful to those who form part of this dream through this means. She promises to follow through with the payment of her dues in the established location.

loans.use: To buy materials such as colored papers.

loans.name: Nancy Yessenia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MANOS JUNTAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nancy Yessenia; ella tiene 33 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de multiservicios y lavandería, la socia atiende desde las 5:30 a.m hasta las 11:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su familia, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar juguetes para la época navideña.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Nancy Yessenia is a member of the “Manos Juntas” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Nancy Yessenia is 33 years old.  She is single and has 2 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business which is a minimarket and laundromat.  She serves her customers from 5.30am to 11.00pm.  Through her business she has managed to get her family ahead in life.  She would like to expand her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy toys for the Christmas season.

She is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by funding her loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy toys for the Christmas season

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma, de 38 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Efraín de 39 años y sus 2 queridos hijos Sofía de 8 y Jairo de 6 años, quienes son el principal motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. El negocio al que se dedica Norma es la venta de productos naturales, aprovechando que tiene ya hace muchos años una tienda de abarrotes muy conocida en la ciudad de San Francisco, ofreciendo a sus clientes productos que son rápidamente comprados, ya que ella sabe muy bien como convencerlos y alentarlos a que se lleven más de un solo producto. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es aconsejar a sus clientes sobre los productos que mejor efecto tendrá para sus males, lleva 2 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es educar a sus clientes sobre la importancia de sus productos, aun así ella sigue adelante muy firme en sus metas. Con el tiempo, desea abrir una tienda exclusivamente para sus productos naturales. Es el décimo segundo crédito con MFP, espera ser muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, ya que desea acceder a más créditos, en su banco comunal es muy participativa. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más productos naturales, con lo cual espera implementar mejor su puesto de ventas.
texts.en:
Norma is 38 years old.  She is a very humble and hard-working woman.  She lives in her own home with her husband, 39 year-old Efraín, and her 2 beloved children, 8 year-old Sofia and 6 year-old Jairo.  Her children are her main motivation to continue with her hard work.  Norma's business is selling natural products.  She takes advantage of the fact that she has had a very well-known grocery store in the town of San Francisco for a number of years and she offers her customers products which are always quickly sold out since she knows very well how to convince her customers to buy and how to encourage them to take more than one product.

What Norma most likes about her work is advising her customers on what product will best treat their ailments.  She has been in this activity for 2 years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be educating her customers on the importance of her products.  Even so, she continues resolute in her aims.

Over time, Norma would like to open a store where she sells nothing but her natural products.  This is her 12th loan with MFP.  She hopes to be very punctual with her repayments since she would like to be able to obtain more loans in the future.  She is a very active member of her community bank.  She will use her 2,000 nuevos soles to buy more natural products with which she hopes to better stock her store.

loans.use: To buy more natural products with which to stock her store

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MANOS JUNTAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria Elena; ella tiene 33 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida en el mercado de San Pedro que queda en una de las calles del Cusco, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para construir su casa.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Maria Elena is a member of the “Manos Juntas” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Maria Elena is 33 years old.  She lives with her partner and has 2 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling food in San Pedro market which is in one of Cusco's streets.  She would like to expand her business.  She is grateful for her loan which she will use to buy materials for building her home.

She is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by funding her loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy materials to build her house

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna, de 56 años, es una mujer que a lo largo de su vida siempre ha luchado por sobresalir, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Emilio de 54 años y su querida hija menor Yoisela de 17 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El restaurante de Reyna es el más concurrido del barrio “Vista Alegre” de la ciudad de San Francisco, todos los días sus clientes se dan cita en su restaurante para degustar los deliciosos menús que prepara. Ella es una cocinera muy buena y es que desde muy pequeña le nació el amor por la cocina. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cocinar es por eso que lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 28 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es atender a todas las personas que entran a su restaurante, ya que muchas veces tiene que trabajar sola.  Para más adelante, espera mejorar la infraestructura de su restaurante y así tener más clientes. Es el décimo cuarto crédito con MFP, siempre ha sido muy puntual en sus pagos y espera serlo ahora también. En su banco comunal es una socia responsable, motivo por el cual es muy querida. Con los dos mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más ingredientes para cocinar, ya que la demanda por su comida ha aumentado.
texts.en:
Reyna is 56 years old.  She is a woman who has fought throughout her life to get ahead.  She lives in her own home with her husband, 54 year-old Emilio, and her beloved daughter Yoisela who is 17 years old.  She would like to provide her husband and her daughter with a better quality of life. 

Reyna's restaurant is one of the busiest in the “Vista Alegre” neighborhood, in the town of San Francisco.  Every day her customers come to her restaurant to taste the delicious dishes which she prepares.  She is a very good cook and she gained her love of cooking at a very young age.  What she most likes about her work is cooking.  She always cooks with great care and attention.  She has been in this business for 28 years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be serving all the people who come to her restaurant since she often has to work alone.

In the future, Reyna would like to improve the infrastructure of her restaurant and thereby have more customers.  This is her tenth loan from MFP.  She has always been very punctual with her repayments and she hopes to keep this up.  She is a very responsible member of her community bank which makes her well liked.  She will use the 1,500 nuevos soles she is requesting to buy more cooking ingredients since the demand for her food has increased.

loans.use: To buy ingredients so that she can continue preparing her food

loans.name: Edgardo Jose

texts.es: El señor Edgardo tiene en su residencia un taller de zapatería en el cual fabrica sandalias, bolsos, carteras, correas y todo tipo de calzado, especialmente para damas. Su experiencia en el oficio la adquirió por trabajar durante 9 años en una empresa grande de calzado que funcionaba en una Zona Franca Industrial, allí, a pesar de estar en un cargo administrativo, aprendió todas las técnicas y etapas del proceso de producción. Después de haberse retirado de la empresa, perfeccionó sus conocimientos al realizar varios cursos de zapatería en el Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje, SENA, que es la más importante escuela de artes y oficios del Estado. Actualmente, el microempresario produce todo tipo de calzado que vende por docenas en misceláneas y almacenes de la ciudad. Las ventas las realiza de contado y en ocasiones otorga de 30 a 45 días de plazo para el pago. El margen promedio de ganancia de su negocio es del 43% y sus ventas mensuales son en promedio de $2.700.000. El taller, a pesar de ser pequeño, está dotado de una máquina de coser industrial y todas las herramientas manuales para producir cualquier tipo de calzado. Normalmente el señor Edgardo trabaja sólo, pero en la temporada de fin de año los pedidos suelen incrementarse considerablemente y contrata a un ayudante que le colabora en el corte del sintético y el cuero. El aspira a su primer préstamo con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo por $1.000.000 que planea invertir en la compra de cuero, sintético, goma, suelas y herrajes. El microempresario dice que uno de sus mayores logros ha sido posicionar sus productos a pesar de la fuerte competencia que significa las importaciones de productos similares a menores precios, pero de menor calidad. Sueña con tener un gran taller de zapatería, equipado de modernas máquinas y muchos empleados. Con su pequeño taller, el señor Edgardo ha logrado darle educación superior a todos sus tres hijos que son su mayor orgullo
texts.en:
Edgardo has a shoemaker's workshop in his home in which he makes sandals, bags, purses, belts and all kinds of shoes, especially for women.  His experience in the trade was acquired when he worked for 9 years in a large footwear company which operated an industrial free-trade zone.  There, in spite of being in an administrative position, he learned all the techniques and stages of the production process.  After leaving the company, he perfected his knowledge by attending a number of shoemaker's courses in the Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje, SENA (the National Apprenticeship Service).  

Currently Edgardo produces all kinds of footwear which he sells by the dozen in stores and warehouses across the city.  He makes his sales for cash and occasionally allows 30 to 45 days for his customers to pay.  His average profit margin is 43% and his monthly sales are on average $2,700,000.  His workshop, although it is small, has an industrial sewing machine and all the manual equipment he needs to produce any type of footwear.  Normally Edgardo works alone but in the end-of-year season his orders usually increase considerably and he hires an assistant who helps him cut his synthetic material and leather.

This is Edgardo's first loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  He is requesting $1,000,000 which he plans to invest in the purchase of leather, synthetic material, rubber, soles and iron fittings.  Edgardo says that one of his biggest achievements has been to sell his products in spite of the strong competition which he has seen from imports of similar products at lower prices but of inferior quality.  He dreams of having a larger shoemaker's workshop, equipped with modern machinery and many employees.  With his small workshop, Edgardo has managed to pay for his children to study in higher education which is his biggest pride.

loans.use: To buy leather, synthetic material, rubber, soles and iron fittings

loans.name: Serafina

texts.es: Serafina, de 46 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Fabián de 43 años y sus 2 hijos menores Dina de 21 y Tabita de 14 años, quienes son el principal motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. La tienda de abarrotes de Serafina es una de las más concurridas de su barrio, el gran carisma que posee y la amabilidad en su trato, han hecho que sea la preferida por sus vecinos, quienes no dudan en hacer sus compras desde muy temprano, ya que saben que es la primera tienda en abrirse y la ultima en cerrarse. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus vecinos sobre las cosas que suceden en su barrio, lleva 7 años en esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día dentro de su tienda, ya que tiene que atender de corrido si no quiere que sus ventas bajen. Para más adelante, espera que su negocio crezca y se convierta en el almacén principal de su barrio. Este el primer crédito con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro con mayor tranquilidad y sin traerle complicaciones a su banco comunal, donde es muy querida por el resto de sus socias. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará mas provisiones para su tienda de abarrotes y así incrementará su stock de productos.
texts.en:
Serafina is 46 years old.  She is a very kind and hard-working woman who lives in her own home with her husband, 43 year-old Fabián, and her two dependent children, Dina who is 21 and Tabita who is 14.  Her children are her main motivation to continue working hard.  Serafina's grocery store is one of the busiest in her neighborhood.  Her great charisma and the kindness which she shows her customers have made hers the most popular store in her neighborhood.  Her customers don't hesitate to shop with her from very early in the morning since they know that her store is the first one to open and the last to close.

What Serafina most likes about her work is chatting with her neighbors about what is happening in the neighborhood.  She has been in this business for 7 years and she considers that the most difficult part of her work is staying in her store all day since she has to serve all the time if she doesn't want her sales to fall.  In the future, she is hoping that her business will grow and that she will become the main store in her neighborhood.

This is Serafina's first loan with MFP.  She knows that if she makes her repayments on time she will be able to access another loan more easily and without inconveniencing her community bank where she is well liked by the rest of the members.  She will use the 1,000 nuevos soles she is requesting to buy more provisions for her grocery store and thereby increase her stock.

loans.use: To stock her store with various products

loans.name: Maria Paulina

texts.es:
María de 50 años, tiene un pequeño comedor de mariscos. Vive en un cantón llamado Playas uno de los lugares turísticos del Ecuador con una diversa dimensión de mariscos.  

Hace 30 años comenzó con un pequeño puesto de madera en la calle principal de la playa. Pero hace 10 años que murió su esposo para poder superarse más económicamente y darles una mejor vida a sus hijos comenzó con su negocio en un local. Trabaja los fines de semana aprovechando los turistas que llegan para comprar la comida típica de la costa del Ecuador. El mínimo del costo de los platos es de $ 3.00 hasta $ 7.00 vende cebiches, pescado frito, camarones apanados etc. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar mesas y sillas para poder agrandar su negocio y que sus clientes estén comodos. En el futuro quiere mejorar su negocio y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María, who is 50 years old, has a small seafood eatery. She lives on a small street called "Playas" ["Beaches"], one of the tourist places in Ecuador with a diverse selection of seafood.

She began 30 years ago with a small wooden stand on the main street of the beach. But 10 years ago, after her husband died, to be able to improve economically and give her children a better life, she began her business in her home. She works on the weekends making the most of the tourists that arrive to buy the typical food of the Ecuadorian coast. The minimum cost of the dishes is from $3.00 to $7.00. She sells "cebiches" (a typical seafood dish), fried fish, breaded shrimp, etc.

With the loan, she wants to buy tables and chairs to be able to enlarge her business and so that her customers can be comfortable. In the future she wants to improve her business and quality of life.

loans.use: To buy tables and chairs.

loans.name: Alfonzo

texts.es: Alfonso, de 57 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Teodora de 45 años y su querida hija menor Zulma de 14 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Con el apoyo de su esposa, Alfonso decidió comprar hace 30 años, unos terrenos en los deseaba trabajar y así mejorar la economía de su familia. Actualmente esos terrenos son trabajados, pero son más productivos que antes, ya que con el paso del tiempo ha aprendido a obtener la mayor producción de café, cacao y hojas de coca. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es la relación tan cercana que tiene con la tierra, además disfruta mucho viendo sus sembríos crecer, lleva 40 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que cuidar sus campos de las inclemencias del clima, ya que cualquier descuido puede afectar la cosecha. En adelante, espera comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar su producción. Este es el primer crédito con MFP; esta muy contento por obtenerlo, ya que lo necesita urgentemente para mejorar su negocio. Con los dos mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono para fortalecer sus sembríos, también invertirá en la compra de ganado, para iniciar un negocio de venta de carne.
texts.en:
Alfonso, 57, is an unassuming, hard working man.  He lives in his own house with his wife, Teodora, 45, and his beloved youngest daughter Zulma, 14, for whom he wants to provide a better quality of life.

With his wife’s help, Alfonso decided 30 years ago to buy some land that he wanted to farm to improve his family’s income.  Currently those fields are farmed and are more productive than before because as time has gone by he has learned how to obtain larger production of coffee, cocoa beans and coca leaves.

What he enjoys most about the work is the close relationship he has with the soil; he also very much enjoys watching his plants grow.  He has been in this line of work for 40 years and considers the most difficult part of it protecting his fields from the inclement weather because any distraction can affect the crops.  In the future he hopes to buy new fields to increase production.

This is his first loan with MFP.  He is very happy to get it because he urgently needs it to improve his business.  He will use the requested 2000 new soles to buy more manure to strengthen his plantings and he will also buy cattle to start a business selling meat.

loans.use: To buy manure and steers to start selling meat.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es: Javier, de 23 años, es un joven padre de familia muy alegre y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Gabriela de 19 años y su querido hijo Jhon de 2 años, quienes son el principal motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Trabajando arduamente Javier ha logrado sacar adelante sus sembríos, todas las mañana se levanta muy temprano para regar y brindarle el cuidado respectivo a sus plantaciones de cacao, café y hojas de coca, los cuales posteriormente venderá en la ciudad de San Francisco, ya que es ahí donde obtiene los mejores precios por sus productos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que puede disfrutar de la libertad de laborar en sus verdes campos, lleva 6 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que trabajar la tierra todo el día, sin que le quede mucho tiempo para realizar otras actividades. Para más adelante, espera comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar su producción. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, sabe que este préstamo le ayudará bastante en el progreso y desarrollo de su negocio, es por eso que esta dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente. Con los tres mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono para sus cultivos, también desea incursionar en el negocio de la venta de ropa.
texts.en: Javier, age 23, is a young, very happy and hardworking family man. He lives in his own house with wife Gabriela, age 19, and his beloved 2-year-old son, Jhon. They are the primary reason behind all his efforts. Javier has managed to make progress with his crops through arduous work. Every morning he wakes up very early to water and otherwise take care of his crops of cocoa, coffee and coca leaves. He will then sell these crops in the city of San Francisco, as that is where he can get the best price for his products. The thing he likes the best about his work is the ability to work freely in his green fields. He has done this work for 6 years. He considers the most difficult thing to be the obligation to work the land every day, without having much time to do other activities. In the future, he hopes to buy new land to increase his production. This is his first loan with MFP. He knows that this loan will help him a lot in advancing and developing his business. Because of this, he is committed to making all payments on time. He will buy mO. fertilizer for his crops with the three thousand soles (Peruvian currency) he is requesting; he also wants to go into business selling clothing.

loans.use: Buy bags of fertilizer and also clothing to begin selling

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Giovanna

texts.es: Giovanna, de 33 años, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de su madre y sus 2 hermanas, juntas cada día se esfuerzan por salir adelante. El día empieza muy temprano para esta dedicada profesora, pues debe recibir a los alumnos en  su centro educativo y comenzar con las enseñanzas diarias que los educará para que sus niños sean  hombres de bien. Desde hace 10 años empezó con la labor de docente, y desde entonces trabajo con mucho ánimo hasta que logró refaccionar su casa;  y ahí mismo instaló su centro educativo particular. Le gusta mucho el trabajo porque con el tiempo ha ido mejorando su negocio y en la actualidad también es la encargada de mandar confeccionar los uniformes de los educandos y por esto obtiene regulares ganancias. Como es una mujer muy emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado continuar con la ampliación del colegio ya que  quiere brindarles lo mejor a los niños. Es el sexto crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Giovanna tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado en el refaccionamiento de los servicios higiénicos de su centro educativo pues desea  mejorar el colegio  para beneficio de sus alumnos.
texts.en: Giovanna, age 33, lives in her own house beside her mother and her 2 sisters. They work hard together every day to move forward in life. The day begins very early for this dedicated teacher. She must greet students at her educational center and begin the day’s lessons, which will teach the children to become good men. She began her work as a teacher 10 years ago. From then she worked enthusiastically until she managed to refurbish her house. There in her house she created her private educational center. She likes her work very much because over time she has been improving her business. Currently she is also in charge of ordering uniforms made for the pupils. This gets her regular profits. Because she is a very enterprising woman, she plans to expand the school to provide the best for the children. This is her sixth loan with MFP. She commits herself to making payments on time. She does not want to be on bad terms with the people that have made possible the money which allows her to continue working towards progress. Giovanna plans to invest the requested money in refurbishing the two restrooms in her educational center. She wants to improve the school for the benefit of its students.

loans.use: Refubrish the restrooms in her educational center

loans.name: Mari Carmen

texts.es:
Mari Carmen es una madre de familia de 30 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en el distrito de San José, una zona pesquera que pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y que se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace cinco años al comercio de productos de primera necesidad, abarrotes y golosinas en una bodega que tiene instalada en un ambiente de su vivienda, allí ella atiende al público en general, especialmente a las mujeres de la zona. Adicionalmente cuenta en ese mismo ambiente con un negocio de alquiler de videojuegos (playstation) orientado básicamente a los jóvenes. Con estos negocios ella ayuda a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

Mari Carmen desea ampliar su bodega con la compra de más mercadería de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y seguir creciendo como empresaria, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

Ella es una mujer bastante activa y responsable, su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria y ayudar a su familia a salir adelante.
texts.en:
Mari Carmen, 30, is a mother living with her husband and children in San José district, a fishing area belonging to Lambayeque province located twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

For the last five years she has been a grocer.  She sells basic need items, groceries and sweets in a store she has set up in part of her house.  She tends to the general public there, especially women from the area.  In addition, she also has a videogame rental business (Playstation) there aimed primarily at youngsters.  She helps her husband support the family with these businesses.

Mari Carmen wants to enlarge her store buying more merchandise so that she can meet customer demand and continue growing as a businesswoman.  She, therefore, has requested a 1500 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa.

She is quite an active, responsible woman.  Her greatest wish is to continue growing as a businesswoman and help her family get ahead.

loans.use: To buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 50 años, vive en su casa que es propia en compañía de su esposo Emilio de 58 años que es taxista, y de sus 3 hijos, de los cuales solo uno es  menor pues los otros son mayores y trabajan independientes. Cada día es de trabajo constante para esta empeñosa dama que se esfuerza por salir adelante, ella es profesora de educación inicial y comparte durante todas las mañanas con sus pequeños alumnos, además le gusta mucho la labor pues los educa con mucho amor. También paralelamente a esta labor también comercializa durante sus ratos libres diversos productos de belleza, de varias marcas reconocidas, a sus amigas y conocidas, y con las ventas por catálogo obtiene regulares ganancias sin mucho esfuerzo. Le gusta mucho trabajar en sus 2 labores para ayudar  a su esposo en los constantes gastos del hogar, de esta manera espera salir adelante, pues quiere concretar su mayor anhelo que es instalar su propio centro educativo, pero sabe que con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación lo concretará. Es el sexto crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. María tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de cantidad de mercadería en productos de belleza pues quiere abastecerse para la campaña navideña que ya esta próxima.
texts.en:
María, 50, lives in her own house with her husband Emilio, 58, who is a taxi driver and their three children only one of whom is still a minor; the others are adults and work independently.

Every day is a day of constant work for this dedicated woman who makes the effort to get ahead.  She is an early education teacher and teaches her young pupils every morning; she enjoys her work very much because she educates them with lots of love.  During her free time she sells various brands of beauty products to friends and acquaintances.  With these catalogue based sales she earns regular income with little effort.  She enjoys working in both her occupations very much to help her husband meet the constant household expenses and get ahead because she’d like to make her greatest dream, to open her own school, a reality.  She knows that with much dedication and effort she will accomplish this.

This is her 6th loan with MFP and she promises to repay punctually because she does not want to disappoint the people who made the money that will allow her to stay in business seeking progress possible.

María plans to use the requested loan to buy a quantity of beauty products to have stock available for the approaching Christmas season.

loans.use: To stock up on beauty products for the approaching Christmas season.

loans.name: Luna Radiante Group

texts.es:
La B.C. “Luna Radiante” inicia su segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana es un grupo muy animado que se ha reunido para  continuar con el trabajo en Pro Mujer, recibiendo los servicios de crédito, capacitación y atención en salud.  Además, ellas comentan que es un espacio en el que pueden compartir y aprovechar de la compañía de sus compañeras, reír y olvidar los problemas. Está compuesta por nueve integrantes.  Los negocios son diversos:  venta de ropa interior, venta de pan, panadería –venta de llauchas, costura, venta de perfumes, venta de ropa deportiva, venta de juguetes, venta de jugo de quinua.

La presidenta de la banca comunal, señora María René es una mujer joven de 28 años, madre de 4 niños,  ingresó a formar parte de la banca comunal porque necesitaba capitalizarse para llevar adelante su negocio de venta de ropa deportiva.  La señora María René vende en su puesto de la zona 16 de Julio, en la feria de los días jueves y domingo.   Aprendió a vender hace algunos años, cuando era vendedora en una tienda de la ciudad de La Paz, luego decidió independizarse y contar con su propio negocio.  El préstamo que ha solicitado es por Bs.800.- y será invertido en la compra de una docena de deportivos.
Cuando se le consultó que le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella comenta que le gusta la reunión que se tiene en el centro focal y en particular su grupo porque es muy unido.
texts.en:
The “Luna Radiante” (Radiant Moon) communal bank is starting its second cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Panamericana Focal Center.  It is a very lively group that has come together to continue working with Pro Mujer receiving credit services, training and health services.  In addition, they comment that this is a place where they can share and enjoy the company of their fellow members, to laugh and forget their problems.  It has nine members with various businesses like: underwear sales, bread sales, bakery, llaucha (cheese turnovers) sales, sewing, perfume sales, sportswear sales, toy sales, quinoa juice sales.

The President of the communal bank, María René, is a young, 28-year-old mother of four children.  She joined the communal bank because she needed training to run her sportswear selling business.  She has a stand in the 16 de Julio neighborhood’s Thursday and Sunday markets.  She learned to sell some years ago when she was a salesperson in a store in the city of La Paz.  She later decided to become independent and open her own business.  She has requested a Bs.800 loan to buy a dozen sports outfits.

When she was asked what she liked about Pro Mujer she commented that she likes the meetings that take place in the focal center especially because the group is very united.

loans.use: To buy sportswear.

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es: Vicenta, de 54 años, vive en su casa que es propia en compañía de sus 2 hijas mayores,  juntas se esfuerzan cada día por salir adelante. Esta luchadora mujer se despierta muy temprano todos los días  para empezar con las labores del hogar. Luego se dirige a recorrer las calles de su zona en busca de nuevos clientes para ofrecerles su mercadería de ropa, que empeñosa comercializa al crédito. Dice que obtiene regulares ganancias pues como ofrece las prendas al crédito, esto le proporciona la ventaja de cobrar con mayor precio del real. Pero comenta que le desagrada caminar durante largas horas por las calles en busca de  nuevos clientes, pero asegura las ventas solo con clientes conocidos o recomendados. Como es una mujer emprendedora, para el futuro tiene muchos planes, entre ellos el de instalar una tienda para vender con mayor tranquilidad pues quiere dejar la venta ambulatoria para establecer su negocio mas formal. Es el sexto crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Vicenta tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de mayor cantidad de mercadería ya que quiere abastecerse de ropa para la  temporada de verano pues tiene varios pedidos pendientes, y de esta manera espera aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en: Vicenta, who is 54 years old, lives in her own home in the company of her two eldest daughters.  Together they work every day to get ahead in life.  She is a fighting woman who wakes up very early every day to begin the housework.  Later, she heads out to the streets of her neighborhood in search of new clients, to offer them her merchandise, new clothing, which she gets orders for on credit.  She says that she gets regular earnings by offering items on credit, which she proportions out to cover the base cost with a higher one.  But she says that she doesn't like walking for long hours in the streets in search of new clients, but she assures sales just with known or recommended clients.
